amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Government Accountability Office to study the Maritime Security Fleet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 114-571 to require the Government Accountability Office to study the Maritime Security Fleet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 41 - 383 (Roll no. 214).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 41 - 383 (Roll no. 214).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Sanford.
